Package io.j4c.config

Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.

The main interface is Config. It covers following use-cases:

  • tree-like structure - it is possible to walk through a configuration structure;
  • accessors - basic value type is String; the API provides accessor methods to map the value into boolean, int, long, double. The API supports also object and list types. You can also choose to use Optional variants of accessor methods.
  • mappers - the API also allows to map a single value or complex Config node into custom Java type;
  • watchers - and finally, user can subscribe on configuration changes.
Use Config.Builder to build new instance of Config.

Configuration API allows map Config value or complex node to custom Java type via ConfigMapper. It also provides built-in Mappers, see ConfigMappers.

Config API is placed in io.j4c.config Java 9 module. Maven coordinates are io.j4c.config:j4c-config.

See Also:
Configuration SPI
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
    Config.Builder
    Config Builder.
    Config.Context
    Context associated with specific Config node that allows to access the last loaded instance of the node or to request reloading of whole configuration.
    Config.Key
    Object represents fully-qualified key of config node.
    Config.Value.None
    Class that represents not-set default values.
    ConfigMapper<T>
    Contextual mapper of a configuration hierarchy to a Java type.
    ConfigSources.MergingStrategy
    Merging strategy allows a user to implement merging of list of root nodes loaded by appropriate config sources into single ConfigNode.ObjectNode used by ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigFilters
    Class provides access to built-in ConfigFilter implementations.
    ConfigFilters.ValueResolvingBuilder
    A builder for value reference resolving filter.
    ConfigHelper
    Common Configuration utilities.
    ConfigMappers
    Collection of configuration mapper utilities.
    ConfigParsers
    Class provides access to built-in ConfigParser implementations.
    ConfigSources
    Class provides access to built-in ConfigSource implementations.
    ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder
    Composite ConfigSource Builder.
    ConfigSources.MapBuilder
    Map ConfigSource Builder.
    OverrideSources
    Class provides access to built-in OverrideSource implementations.
    PollingStrategies
    Class provides access to built-in PollingStrategy implementations.
    PollingStrategies.FilesystemWatchBuilder
    A builder for a filesystem watch polling strategy.
    PollingStrategies.ScheduledBuilder
    A builder for a scheduled polling strategy.
    RetryPolicies
    Class provides access to built-in RetryPolicy implementations.
    RetryPolicies.Builder
    A builder of the default RetryPolicy.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Config.Type
    Configuration node types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigException
    Exception is thrown by Config implementations.
    ConfigMappingException
    Configuration value mapping exception.
    MissingValueException
    Exception representing a specific failures related to a missing configuration value.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Config.Transient
    Annotation used to exclude JavaBean property, method or constructor from JavaBean deserialization support.
    Config.Value
    Annotation used to customize behaviour of JavaBean deserialization support, generic ConfigMapper implementation.
